title: Courgette tart
ingredients: ['1 package frozen puff pastry sheet', '1 courgette', 'salt, as needed for salting', '125g ricotta cheese', '30g grated Parmesan cheese', '30g grated mozzarella cheese', 'salt and ground black pepper, to taste', '3 tablespoons olive oil', '2 garlic cloves, minced', '1 egg yolk', '1 tablespoon cold water', 'a few sprigs fresh basil, chopped']
